dialog.line: Hey!
Come on! Get up!
That's good, really, that's very good!
You achieved to get up as a grown-up!
Mom is proud of you, huhu.
And yes, sweet pea, I'm your mommy, my name is Mwon Mwon the volcano!
Can you hear that mess, outside?
That's our signal, for... er...
We may not stay here, looking each other straight in the eye, don't you think?
I'm sure you're excited to venture all around with your pretty brand new legs.
Therefore... let's do a small check-up, quickly.
You seems to be ready to jump in life, sweetheart.
Otherwise, honestly, you got hidden gifts...
Everybody in the world is talented.
Look! One barbarous lad have tossed a... cracked musical device in your room... tsssk!
Are you able to morph in?
Neat! You are now disguised as a cracked musical device!
You know my child, your body is responsive to humancrafted props.
Now, can you morph out?
Ok ok, that would do the trick, I guess...
Listen boyo, wanna please Mom? I want you to have some "shopping" for me.
I need a bouncy thing, inflatable, nice and plumpy!
The perfect prop for games and sports, ok?
You'll see, we'll craft a nice prank, together.
The Mom and Son Prank!
Don't forget to say hi to your cousins, along the way.
Andandand this is very important.
If you're in trouble, stick with your cousins, ok?
Nothing is better than family to cure complaints and life disorder.
Gogogo, sweet pea! Hop in the hole !
